page.title: 12Modern Bromsgrove
page.content: {An Interview {Q.}Was there a by-pass when you moved here?{A.}No{Q.}What was the area like then,were the by-pass is now? A.Rough ground Q.Was Fine Fare here? A.No,there was an old Market Cross building which is now at Avon Croft Museum Q.do you think the new shops in Bromsgrove are better than the old shops? A.No,the old shops sold better things than they do now .And I have to go to other places to buy things I want Q.What things do you like about living in Bromsgrove? A.The people are nice Q.Why did you move into Bromsgrove? A.Because the accomadation is cheaper than most other places{Q.} Do you think that turning Bromsgrove High St into a pedestrian precinct has improved the shop buisness?{A.} No.Because I think the shops don't get so many customers because you can't
